entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to a few flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
